song.title: Stellar Romance
song.info:
[i]Lyrics: I want to give you so much When you need so few Why is it so hard when all i want Is to simply be with you
So close and so far So smooth, so hard My joy can't be more intense When we're alone together
My stellar romance Supernova in silence
Sensitive moments Peacefull and quiet I can't believe you're unreachable In spite of the distance I feel unstoppable
I always tell you my love When you need nothing Why are you so blue when all i want Is to stop the waiting
I don't know how long i could stand But i guess i'll keep trying again.[/i]
